languages.text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Процедуры омоложения в очередной раз обратили время вспять, и не спрашивайте, сколько именно иголок в меня воткнули наши хирургеоны. Однако я исцелился от старческих недугов... Ну, большей их части. Нельзя избегать смерть вечно — каждый раз она откусывает от меня кусочек за кусочком".

"Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask me how many needles our chirurgeons had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Лорд-капитан. Процедуры омоложения в очередной раз обратили время вспять, и не спрашивайте, сколько именно иголок в меня воткнули наши хирургеоны. Однако я исцелился от старческих недугов... Ну, большей их части. Нельзя избегать смерть вечно — каждый раз она откусывает от меня кусочек за кусочком".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask how many needles our good healers had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot trick death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes a bite another bite out of me."

But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot trick death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes a bite another bite out of me."

But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot trick death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes a bite another bite out of me."

But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

languages.text: “他们做得很好，舰长大人。恢复活力的治疗流程让时间再次倒流，也让我再次恢复了活力，只要别问我们的医师在我身上扎了多少针就好。不过，我确实已经从年迈这种恶疾中恢复过来了……嗯，基本算是恢复过来了。人不可能永远逃避死亡。每当我走到死亡边缘时，它都会咬我一口。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask me how many needles our chirurgeons had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

traits.locale_text: “他们做得很好，舰长大人。恢复活力的治疗流程让时间再次倒流，也让我再次恢复了活力，只要别问我们的医师在我身上扎了多少针就好。不过，我确实已经从年迈这种恶疾中恢复过来了……嗯，基本算是恢复过来了。人不可能永远逃避死亡。每当我走到死亡边缘时，它都会咬我一口。”

languages.original_text: "Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask how many needles our chirurgeons had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

languages.text: «Así es, Lord Capitán. El proceso rejuvenecedor ha vuelto a dar marcha atrás al reloj. Por favor, no pregunte cuántas agujas han tenido que clavarme nuestros cirujanos para conseguirlo. Pero me he repuesto de los achaques de la edad... casi totalmente. Nadie puede esquivar eternamente a la muerte, y cada vez que estoy al borde de caer en sus garras me pasa factura».
languages.original_text: "Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask me how many needles our chirurgeons had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

traits.locale_text: «Así es, Lord Capitán. El proceso rejuvenecedor ha vuelto a dar marcha atrás al reloj. Por favor, no pregunte cuántas agujas han tenido que clavarme nuestros cirujanos para conseguirlo. Pero me he repuesto de los achaques de la edad... casi totalmente. Nadie puede esquivar eternamente a la muerte, y cada vez que estoy al borde de caer en sus garras me pasa factura».

languages.text: 「確かにそうです、ロード・キャプテン。若返りの施術のおかげで、時計の針は巻き戻ったのです。ですが、そのためにチラージョンが私に何本針を刺したかは聞かないでいただきたいものです。ですが、私は老いの病から回復した…完全に、というわけではありませんが。人は永遠に死から逃れることはできません。その淵に迫る度に、死は再び私を蝕むのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask me how many needles our chirurgeons had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

traits.locale_text: 「確かにそうです、ロード・キャプテン。若返りの施術のおかげで、時計の針は巻き戻ったのです。ですが、そのためにチラージョンが私に何本針を刺したかは聞かないでいただきたいものです。ですが、私は老いの病から回復した…完全に、というわけではありませんが。人は永遠に死から逃れることはできません。その淵に迫る度に、死は再び私を蝕むのでしょう」
「確かにそうです、ロード・キャプテン。若返りの施術のおかげで、時計の針は巻き戻ったのです。ですが、そのためにチラージョンが私に何本針を刺したかは聞かないでいただきたいものです。ですが、私は老いの病から回復した…完全に、というわけではありませんが。人は永遠に死から逃れることはできません。その淵に迫る度に、死は再び私を蝕むのでしょう」

languages.text: "Oh ja, Lord Captain. Die Verjüngungsprozeduren haben die Uhr wieder einmal zurückgedreht — fragt mich nur besser nicht, mit wie vielen Nadeln unsere Chirurgen mich stechen mussten, um das zu bewerkstelligen. Ich bin jedoch von den Plagen des Alters genesen ... Nun ja, von den meisten. Man kann dem Tod nicht ewig aus dem Weg gehen. Jedes Mal, wenn ich am Abgrund stehe, beißt er ein weiteres kleines Stück von mir ab."
languages.original_text: "Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask me how many needles our chirurgeons had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

Jedes Mal, wenn ich am Abgrund stehe, beißt er ein weiteres kleines Stück von mir ab."

"Oh ja, Lord Captain. Die Verjüngungsprozeduren haben die Uhr wieder einmal zurückgedreht — fragt nur besser nicht, mit wie vielen Nadeln unsere Chirurgen mich stechen mussten, um das zu bewerkstelligen. Ich bin jedoch von den Plagen des Alters genesen ... Nun ja, von den meisten. Man kann dem Tod nicht ewig aus dem Weg gehen. Jedes Mal, wenn ich am Abgrund stehe, beißt er ein weiteres kleines Stück von mir ab."

languages.text: « Absolument, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les procédures de rajeunissement m'ont permis de remonter le temps une fois encore, mais ne me demandez pas combien d'aiguilles nos chirurgeons ont dû planter dans mon corps pour y parvenir. Quoi qu'il en soit, je me suis remis des maux de la vieillesse... Enfin, de la plupart. Personne ne peut échapper à la mort éternellement. À chaque pas que je fais dans sa direction, elle m'arrache une autre partie de moi. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask me how many needles our chirurgeons had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."

traits.locale_text: « Absolument, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les procédures de rajeunissement m'ont permis de remonter le temps une fois encore, mais ne me demandez pas combien d'aiguilles nos chirurgeons ont dû planter dans mon corps pour y parvenir. Quoi qu'il en soit, je me suis remis des maux de la vieillesse... Enfin, de la plupart. Personne ne peut échapper à la mort éternellement. À chaque pas que je fais dans sa direction, elle m'arrache une autre partie de moi. »

languages.text: "Evet Lord Kaptan. Gençleştirme süreciyle eski dinçliğime tekrar kavuşabildim. Fakat cerrahlarımızın bu uğurda kaç iğne harcadığını sormayın. Nihayetinde ihtiyarlığın etkilerinden kurtuldum... Yani çoğundan. Ölümden kaçış yok, eşiğine her gelişimde bir parçamı yitiriyorum."
languages.original_text: "Indeed they have, Lord Captain. The rejuvenating procedures have turned the clock back once more — just don't ask me how many needles our chirurgeons had to stick in me to make it happen. But I am recovered from the ills of old age... Well, most of them. One cannot evade death forever — every time I come to the brink, it takes another bite out of me."
